level.text: No person shall sell or offer for sale in the District any device designed to detect or counteract police radar.
No person shall use or have in his possession in an automobile in the District any device used to detect or counteract police radar.
This section does not apply to any vehicle or equipment used by the Armed Forces of the United States.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Commissioner’s Order 61-2026 effective November 21, 1961, Article 25, § 16 of the Police Regulations (May, 1981).
